name: SpaceJam (FlipFlop)
description:
Welcome captain, are you ready to start your adventure in the Mashup spaceship? Swipe through choices as you encounter the crew, but make sure not to run out of fuel, money, health, or crew, or it's mission over.

The game is made for Android but still playable on computer. And due to some 10000 pixels sprite the card are black on adroid, it is also the same with all the crew member, will be fix before friday XXX FlipFlop

Programation, animation and sound effect made by FlipFlop

Art, music and game story made by Soul
